title: Iceberg Fantasy
medium: Brush and oil paint on paper backed with canvas
description: A bay is bordered by a shore in the foreground, showing a rock at right, by glaciers or icebergs in the back.  A sailboat is in the left middle distance.  A boat seems to be at anchor near the rock; a man in a row boat is beside its stern.  Scene is painted on a creamy ground.
name: Drawing
